<Link id="l00433" /><CodeLine lineNumber="433"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> MachOWriter::writeCodeSignatureData() &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00434" /><CodeLine lineNumber="434"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// NOTE: This CodeSignature section behaviour must be kept in sync with that</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00435" /><CodeLine lineNumber="435"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// performed in LLD&#39;s CodeSignatureSection::write /</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00436" /><CodeLine lineNumber="436"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// CodeSignatureSection::writeHashes. Furthermore, this call must occur only</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00437" /><CodeLine lineNumber="437"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// after the rest of the binary has already been written to the buffer. This</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00438" /><CodeLine lineNumber="438"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// is because the buffer is read from to perform the necessary hashing.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00439" /><CodeLine lineNumber="439"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00440" /><CodeLine lineNumber="440"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The CodeSignature section is the last section in the MachO binary and</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00441" /><CodeLine lineNumber="441"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// contains a hash of all content in the binary before it. Since llvm-objcopy</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00442" /><CodeLine lineNumber="442"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// has likely modified the target binary, the hash must be regenerated</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00443" /><CodeLine lineNumber="443"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// entirely. To generate this hash, we must read from the start of the binary</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00444" /><CodeLine lineNumber="444"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// (HashReadStart) to just before the start of the CodeSignature section</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00445" /><CodeLine lineNumber="445"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// (HashReadEnd).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00446" /><CodeLine lineNumber="446"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00447" /><CodeLine lineNumber="447"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> CodeSignatureInfo &amp;CodeSignature = LayoutBuilder.getCodeSignature();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00448" /><CodeLine lineNumber="448"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00449" /><CodeLine lineNumber="449"><Highlight kind="normal">  uint8&#95;t &#42;BufferStart = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">reinterpret&#95;cast&lt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">uint8&#95;t &#42;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">&gt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">(Buf-&gt;getBufferStart());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00450" /><CodeLine lineNumber="450"><Highlight kind="normal">  uint8&#95;t &#42;HashReadStart = BufferStart;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00451" /><CodeLine lineNumber="451"><Highlight kind="normal">  uint8&#95;t &#42;HashReadEnd = BufferStart + CodeSignature.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/objcopy/macho/codesignatureinfo/#a501dae31ffe5fe07a5b64d779f067c33">StartOffset</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00452" /><CodeLine lineNumber="452"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00453" /><CodeLine lineNumber="453"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The CodeSignature section begins with a header, after which the hashes</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00454" /><CodeLine lineNumber="454"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// of each page of the binary are written.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00455" /><CodeLine lineNumber="455"><Highlight kind="normal">  uint8&#95;t &#42;HashWriteStart = HashReadEnd + CodeSignature.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/objcopy/macho/codesignatureinfo/#aba0e101947a011beae3dc845410d08cb">AllHeadersSize</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00456" /><CodeLine lineNumber="456"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00457" /><CodeLine lineNumber="457"><Highlight kind="normal">  uint32&#95;t TextSegmentFileOff = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00458" /><CodeLine lineNumber="458"><Highlight kind="normal">  uint32&#95;t TextSegmentFileSize = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00459" /><CodeLine lineNumber="459"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (O.TextSegmentCommandIndex) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00460" /><CodeLine lineNumber="460"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> LoadCommand &amp;TextSegmentLoadCommand =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00461" /><CodeLine lineNumber="461"><Highlight kind="normal">        O.LoadCommands&#91;&#42;O.TextSegmentCommandIndex&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00462" /><CodeLine lineNumber="462"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(TextSegmentLoadCommand.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/objcopy/macho/loadcommand/#a521ae30565359d9c67ad94fed18ce660">MachOLoadCommand</a>.load&#95;command&#95;data.cmd ==</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00463" /><CodeLine lineNumber="463"><Highlight kind="normal">               MachO::LC&#95;SEGMENT ||</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00464" /><CodeLine lineNumber="464"><Highlight kind="normal">           TextSegmentLoadCommand.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/objcopy/macho/loadcommand/#a521ae30565359d9c67ad94fed18ce660">MachOLoadCommand</a>.load&#95;command&#95;data.cmd ==</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00465" /><CodeLine lineNumber="465"><Highlight kind="normal">               MachO::LC&#95;SEGMENT&#95;64);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00466" /><CodeLine lineNumber="466"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(StringRef(TextSegmentLoadCommand.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/objcopy/macho/loadcommand/#a521ae30565359d9c67ad94fed18ce660">MachOLoadCommand</a></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00467" /><CodeLine lineNumber="467"><Highlight kind="normal">                         .segment&#95;command&#95;data.segname) == </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;&#95;&#95;TEXT&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00474" /><CodeLine lineNumber="474"><Highlight kind="normal">                               CodeSignature.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/objcopy/macho/codesignatureinfo/#a0a0e168fdd15c9efb952ce4eea5b516b">OutputFileName</a>.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref/#a5db9240c74644c67759dd0f901fc3c7d">size</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00475" /><CodeLine lineNumber="475"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00533" /><CodeLine lineNumber="533"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00534" /><CodeLine lineNumber="534"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="preprocessor">#if defined(&#95;&#95;APPLE&#95;&#95;)</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00535" /><CodeLine lineNumber="535"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// This is macOS-specific work-around and makes no sense for any</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00536" /><CodeLine lineNumber="536"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// other host OS. See https://openradar.appspot.com/FB8914231</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00537" /><CodeLine lineNumber="537"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00538" /><CodeLine lineNumber="538"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The macOS kernel maintains a signature-verification cache to</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00539" /><CodeLine lineNumber="539"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// quickly validate applications at time of execve(2).  The trouble</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00540" /><CodeLine lineNumber="540"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// is that for the kernel creates the cache entry at the time of the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00541" /><CodeLine lineNumber="541"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// mmap(2) call, before we have a chance to write either the code to</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00542" /><CodeLine lineNumber="542"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// sign or the signature header+hashes.  The fix is to invalidate</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00543" /><CodeLine lineNumber="543"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// all cached data associated with the output file, thus discarding</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00544" /><CodeLine lineNumber="544"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// the bogus prematurely-cached signature.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00545" /><CodeLine lineNumber="545"><Highlight kind="normal">  msync(BufferStart, CodeSignature.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/objcopy/macho/codesignatureinfo/#a501dae31ffe5fe07a5b64d779f067c33">StartOffset</a> + CodeSignature.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/objcopy/macho/codesignatureinfo/#a563a66a1ed642fbf208daf432e7aeabe">Size</a>,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00546" /><CodeLine lineNumber="546"><Highlight kind="normal">        MS&#95;INVALIDATE);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00547" /><CodeLine lineNumber="547"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="preprocessor">#endif</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00548" /><CodeLine lineNumber="548"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
